caption.p: Acute toxicity effects of plant extracts on body weight changes in non-pregnant female Wistar albino rats at dose (A) 125 mg/kg, (B) 500 mg/kg, and (C) 2000 mg/kg b.w. Note: D0 = day zero, and D14 = day 14. Comparisons were made with a control group before and after the experiment. The data illustrated the mean + SD of 3 rats per treatment groups (n = 3).
